metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5981 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found that the response times to malformed ciphertextsin RSA-PSK ClientKeyExchange differ from response times of ciphertexts withcorrect PKCS#1 v1.5 padding.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.8.1-4ubuntu1.1
libgnutls-dane0 - 3.8.1-4ubuntu1.1
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.8.1-4ubuntu1.1
libgnutls30 - 3.8.1-4ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.8.1-4ubuntu1.1').
